summary: This document appears to be a financial record related to the Haze Trust Account at Deutsche Bank. It outlines the account details, customer identification policies, and compliance requirements for anti-money laundering and terrorist financing. The document emphasizes the importance of accurate information and the responsibilities of clients in maintaining their accounts.
locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document pertains to the Haze Trust Account at Deutsche Bank.
It includes customer identification policies required by federal law.
The document emphasizes the bank's obligations to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing.
Clients are required to notify the bank of any changes to their personal or institutional information.
There are references to various banking services and account types offered by Deutsche Bank.
